name: 莱莎·威尔逊

last_movies.title: 末日巡逻队 第一季

introduction: American actress, Lesa Wilson was a semi finalist on the third season of American Idol, crowned Miss Georgia USA 2006, and then placed second runner up to Miss USA. She launched into DC Comics stardom as she was cast to portray Bobbie Burman on the CW's Stargirl, and superhero Rhea Jones aka Loadstone on Doom Patrol. She was then cast to play yet another iconic character; the queen mother, in the BYU series, Dwight in Shining Armor. Her credits continue to grow as she's proven to be a force of nature on screen with a passion for storytelling.Lesa spent 3 years as the voice of the daily horoscopes for audible.com, she was also the voice of the Belk department store commercials for 2 years, and she narrates young adult novels, self help books and many more through her partnership with Lantern Audio.
